attributes.action: Stop London Bus slogans Subhan Allah "Glory to God". It is offensive.
attributes.additional_details: If we were to do it to promote the Christianity or Judaism, hinduism or any other religion the same way, the muslims would find it offensive and would be complaining pretty quickly.   Lets have some equality here.  This is for the period of ramadan which means noting to the rest of us.  Why promote islam above any other religion
attributes.background: Stop London Bus slogans Subhan Allah "Glory to God",  This offends other cultures and religions here in the UK. This is about promoting islam,  Please remove it from the buses, it is offensive to religious people of various religions who have to hide their faith for fear of offending muslims.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Transport for London, which is responsible for buses in London, is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
